mapper.select: select id, subject, reg_date as regDate, mod_date as modDate, explanation, content1, content2, content3 from guide
select id, subject, reg_date as regDate, mod_date as modDate, explanation, content1, content2, content3 from guide where id = #{id}
select id, name, is_use as isUse, reg_date as regDate, mod_date as modDate from property_type order by id
select id, name, property_type_id as propertyTypeId, is_use as isUse, reg_date as regDate, mod_date as modDate from sub_property_type where property_type_id = #{propertyTypeId}
select id, name, is_use as isUse, reg_date as regDate, mod_date as modDate from room_type

select booking.id, booking.property_id as propertyId, booking.guest_id as guestId, booking.host_id as hostId, booking.guest_count as guestCount, booking.day_count as dayCount, booking.total_price as totalPrice, booking.booking_number as bookingNumber, booking.check_in_date as checkInDate, booking.check_out_date as checkOutDate, booking.confirm_date as confirmDate, booking.reg_date as regDate, booking.mod_date as modDate, member.name as guestName, member.id as memberId from booking, member where booking.guest_id = member.id and booking.host_id = #{hostId}

select id, name, host_id as hostId, address, price, bed_count as bedCount, max_guest as maxGuest, reg_date as regDate, mod_date as modDate, room_type_id as roomTypeId, sub_property_type_id as subPropertyTypeId from property where host_id = #{hostId}

select booking.id, booking.host_id as hostId, booking.total_price as totalPrice, booking.confirm_date as confirmDate, transaction.id, transaction.booking_id as bookingId, transaction.is_refund as isReFund, transaction.site_fee as siteFee, transaction.pay_expt_date as payExptDate, transaction.reg_date as regDate, transaction.mod_date as modDate from transaction, booking where booking.id = transaction.booking_id and booking.host_id = #{hostId}
